Things to keep in mind

For perms and dyeing, additional charges may apply based on hair length.
Please be aware that if your hair is bleached, you may not be able to get a perm.
The duration of procedure typically takes between 1 to 4 hours.
Please provide all the requested information in detail in the reservation page. 
Perm is not available for clients with hair damage due to bleaching or dyeing processes.
To finalize your reservation, please make a deposit payment, and on the day of your visit, pay the additional amounts depending on the service you get.
Your reservation will be automatically cancelled if you are more than 10 minutes late for your reservation, and the deposit will not be refunded.
Please make reservations for the actual number of people visiting. 
You can make reservations for two or more products per person. 
Please keep in mind that if the 'cut' is done by head designer, you have to pay an additional 38,000 KRW. It is normally done by other designers (in this case no additional cost); but sometimes head designer have to do it due to schedule. 
For reservation changes or inquiries, contact us at mailto:help@creatrip.com.

 
 
 

 

 
 

How To Use

Please provide the requested information in detail and proceed with the deposit payment.

After the deposit payment is complete, your reservation will be confirmed within 1-2 business days.

If there is a need to change the reservation date, you will be notified through the provided email or messenger app.

During your visit, please show your reservation details to the staff.

 
 
 

 

 
 

Cancellation Policy

Cancellations up to 3 days before visit: Full Refund

value.ticket_content:
Thanyalak Pita: Dear Creatrip help tem

Could you please let me know. If I purchase tickets 2 person at the same time (same booking reference). Can we get seats next to each other? And How can I get in artists walking on red carpet activity ?

Thank you in advance.

Hitomi: Hi,
 
Thank you for contacting Creatrip.
 
If you purchase tickets for two people under the same reservation, we will do our best to provide adjacent seats upon request. However, please note that seat allocation may vary depending on availability at the time of booking, so we recommend making your reservation as early as possible.
 
Regarding participation in the artist's red carpet event, please be aware that entry may be restricted or a special pass may be required depending on the event. For more information, please check the official website for viewing instructions.
 
If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us. We are happy to assist you.
 
Best regards,
Creatrip Team
---

Kathy Lee: Hello Creatrip,Thank for the notifying me.
Yes, we are a group of 4 people.
*Kira Storch- Chiu
*Annie Chang
*Elisa Lau
*Kathy Lee

Would it be possible to have 2 people start at 10am and the other set to start at 10:30am?

We are also open to splitting up 2 people at 10am at the Yeonnam branch and 2 people at 10am at the Donggyo branch.

Please advise the best option.
Thank you so much for your help.
kathy

Hi,

We are reaching out in regards to your reservation. 

We noticed that your order includes four participants, but the studio can accommodate a maximum of three people per time slot. If you would like all four to have sessions at the same time, we can arrange the following:

10-16 10:00
2 people at Yeonnam Branch & 2 people at Donggyo Branch (Address: https://map.naver.com/p/search/%EC%84%9C%EC%9A%B8%20%EB%A7%88%ED%8F%AC%EA%B5%AC%20%EB%8F%99%EA%B5%90%EB%8F%99%20200-27%202F/place/1277744782?c=15.00,0,0,0,dh)

Things to keep in mind

During peak seasons such as Korean holidays, Lunar New Year, and Chuseok, reservations may be difficult to secure.
Adult fares apply for ages 13 and up. Children aged 6â€“12 receive a 50% discount, and children under 5 ride free if they do not occupy a seat.
Train schedules may be adjusted temporarily, so please check your ticket and on-site announcements for final departure and arrival times.
Actual travel time may vary depending on traffic conditions. Delays are more likely during holidays or rush hours.
Seat selection is not available during booking, but if there are enough seats, passengers under the same reservation will be assigned adjacent seats.
Face-to-face seat arrangements (two seats facing each other) cannot be selected in advance.
Free Wi-Fi is available onboard KTX trains, and some seats are equipped with power outlets.
If you have any other inquiries, please contact us at mailto:help@creatrip.com.

 
 
 

 

 
 

How To Use

How to Reserve
Prices on this page are based on KRW and may vary in real time according to the USD exchange rate. The final payment amount will be applied based on the exchange rate at the time of payment.
You can select your preferred departure time when filling out the reservation form.
If all selected train times are sold out, the reservation will be automatically canceled.
Once your reservation is confirmed, the final ticket details will be available in your voucher, so please make sure to check it.
How to Use
Please arrive at the platform at least 10 minutes before departure.
There's no need to print your ticketâ€”just check your ticket info and board according to your assigned seat.
If a KTX staff member asks to see your ticket during the ride, please present it.
Ticket Format & Important Notes
Ticket purchase date and time
Travel date
Departure/arrival locations and times
Train number, car number, seat number, and ticket QR code (some info may be blurred in the sample image)
Ticket number (unique identifier for the ticket; partially hidden in the sample image)
Name of the person who booked (hidden in the sample image for privacy)
* If you reserve through Creatrip, the ticket may show the name of a staff member, but this will not affect usage.

 
 
 

 

 
 

Cancellation Policy

Cancellations and changes are allowed up to 3 days before the reservation date.

To request a change or cancellation, you must contact us at mailto:help@creatrip.com.

If you miss your train due to personal reasons, refunds or changes will not be possible.

Even if you try to cancel or change your ticket directly at the station, refunds cannot be processed through Creatrip.

 
 
 

 

 
Present the attached file at the place of your reservation.

Sarah Ainsworth: Hello 
My sister already made rervation at 5pm at 1 August. I am coming with her. That's why I also book 5pm. Thank you.

Hitomi: Hello,
 
Thank you for contacting us! If you could provide your reservation number, we will check the details of your booking. If you have any special requests or questions, please feel free to let us know. We look forward to welcoming both of you.
 
Best regards,
Creatrip Team

Hello booking number is 2507117pc38a

It is still under 'Confirming' 

Thank you

Luna: Hello,
 
Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your booking (number: 2507117pc38a). We have sent you a notification email about your reservation, but since we have not yet received your reply, we are unable to proceed with the booking at this time.
 
For your reference, we are forwarding the email content below. Please kindly reply to that email so we can continue processing your reservation.
Hi,
 
We are reaching out in regards to your reservation.
 
Since the store has indicated that they are unable to accommodate your initially scheduled time, we kindly ask you to let us know if any of the following alternative times work for you:
 
2025-08-01 14:00 , 2025-08-01 15:30 , 2025-08-01 18:30 , 2025-08-01 20:00
 
Please kindly reply by 7/13 09:00 KST. If not, we may need to cancel your reservation.
 
*If you are able to adjust your appointment time, please click the button below to select a new available time. If you have other specific time requests, please reply to this email and provide 2-3 alternative times so we can arrange it for you more quickly.
 
Best regards,
Creatrip Team
If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to let us know. Thank you for your cooperation!
 
Best regards,
Creatrip Team

Hanna Hammer

Hi,

We are reaching out in regards to your reservation. 

Since the store has indicated that they are unable to accommodate your initially scheduled time, we kindly ask you to let us know if any of the following alternative times work for you:

9/11 10:00
